description: Try our easy to follow Risoni With Spinach & Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Risoni With Spinach & Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch english spinach, leaves removed, shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Cook risoni following packet instructions. Drain and rinse.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and cook, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes or until onion has softened. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute. Gradually whisk in milk. Continue to whisk for 5 minutes or until sauce has thickened.
Add spinach and cook for 3 minutes or until wilted. Stir in risoni and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
